title: The Road
occurrences: For Kavin's birthday celebration, we have planned a long road trip to Kanyakumari.
Wondering, you're asking about road trip.
Not only your family, many other families have died as orphans on this road.
-Not only your family, many other families have died as orphans on this road.
Minister Pichaimuthu died in a road accident.
The tree is far off the road, how is it possible to hit on it?
On that night, I came to the main road to flee from the town.
You take other's life, made this road a hell and speaking philosophically as God and hand.
This is personal to each and everyone who has lost relationships on this road like me.
Does the money grow on tree or is it lying on the road?
Chella, in future if road accidents decrease, then where to go?
We should extend our boundaries. This isn't a road, it's a gold mine.
Wherever there is road on this earth, our empire must be there.
Hereafter this road will be under your control.
How many people, with how many dreams have traveled on that road?
